violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

nodes.html: <label for="darkModeCheckboxDesktop" id="darkModeLabel" class="toggle-label" tabindex="0" role="switch" onkeydown="if(event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') { event.preventDefault(); document.getElementById('darkModeCheckboxDesktop').click(); }">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role switch is not allowed for given element

violations.description: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
violations.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

nodes.html: <label for="darkModeCheckboxDesktop" id="darkModeLabel" class="toggle-label" tabindex="0" role="switch" onkeydown="if(event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') { event.preventDefault(); document.getElementById('darkModeCheckboxDesktop').click(); }">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Required ARIA attribute not present: aria-checked

Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Element does not have an explicit <label>
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
violations.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.html: <div class="header-topbar-wrapper dark-gradient" role="banner" style="--header-nav-position: relative; --header-nav-menu-text-color: #FFFFFF; --header-nav-menu-background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,0,0.8), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0));">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The banner landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one banner landmark

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

violations.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
violations.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element should have focusable content
  Element should be focusable
